name: Priority Matrix Web App
description: A productivity-focused web app based on the Eisenhower Matrix to help you take control of your tasks and projects. With support for multiple projects, task tracking, emailing capabilities, and export features, this tool is your personal priority assistant.

sections.title: Prioritize Like a Pro
sections.text: Categorize tasks into Urgent & Important, Not Urgent but Important, and more. This matrix structure keeps you focused on what truly matters every day.
sections.htmlText: Categorize tasks into Urgent & Important, Not Urgent but Important, and more. This matrix structure keeps you focused on what truly matters every day.

sections.title: Multi-Project Support
sections.text: Create and manage tasks across multiple projects, each with its own matrix. Perfect for professionals juggling different responsibilities.
sections.htmlText: Create and manage tasks across multiple projects, each with its own matrix. Perfect for professionals juggling different responsibilities.

sections.title: Export and Share
sections.text: Easily export your task matrix as PDF or send it via email in Excel format. Keep your team or manager in the loop with zero hassle.
sections.htmlText: Easily export your task matrix as PDF or send it via email in Excel format. Keep your team or manager in the loop with zero hassle.

sections.title: Complete Your Tasks with Focus
sections.text: Mark tasks as completed and keep track of your momentum. The app encourages accountability while keeping the interface minimal and clutter-free.
sections.htmlText: Mark tasks as completed and keep track of your momentum. The app encourages accountability while keeping the interface minimal and clutter-free.

sections.title: Boost Your Productivity
sections.htmlText: Get the Priority Matrix
